knimeNode.name: Dendrogram with Heatmap
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows to create dendrogram with a heatmap (using the nodes from KNIME Labs the Distance Matrix feature).

fullDescription.intro: This node creates dendrogram with heatmap. The colours are adjustable, the order of the columns are changeable.

ports.inPort: A tree model from the New Hierarchical Clustering node.
Data with same keys (in the same order) as the Cluster tree has.

views.view: This view shows a heatmap with the dendrogram.
